page.title: 04Expanding Peacehaven
page.content:
The buildings in the Strawberry Hill site ( north Peacehaven ) are constructed from brick and tiles.
There are four designs.
1. The LEWISTON which has a separate laundry and a joint kitchen-diner which the builders hope will benefit those with small children.
2. The MADISON which has no laundry but separate dining accomodation.
3. The NASHVILLE with its en-suite shower
4. The PRINCETON which adds a double garage. The site designer has been careful to insist on a selection of each design within limited boundaries.
